maxSpeed.range: The max speed must be between {{low}} and {{high}}km/h

totalLength.range: The total length must be between {{low}} and {{high}}m

totalMass.range: The total weight must be between {{low}} and {{high}}t

info.maxSpeed: The max speed has been updated to reflect the new consist data.
info.totalLength: The length has been updated to reflect the new consist data.
info.totalMass: The weight has been updated to reflect the new consist data.

datePickerErrors.invalidInput: The date must be formatted as dd/mm/yy

form.viaNotDefined: Au moins une localisation n'est pas renseignée

mailFeedback.body:
We invite you to send us a message.
As soon as you have a concern or a remark,
even if it's not perfectly worded.

Thank you in advance,
The {{stdcmName}} project team

(you may delete this message)
mailFeedback.description: Help us improve {{stdcmName}} by sending us your feedback and suggestions.
mailFeedback.subject: {{stdcmName}} - feedback, suggestions
mailFeedback.title: Any feedback or suggestions?

noConfigurationFound.text: Please contact the maintenance team so they can get you back on track.
noConfigurationFound.title: A configuration problem prevents you from performing a search

reportSheet.warningMessage: This sheet has been generated by a simulation tool. It does not exempt the scheduler from the checks inherent in the STDCM layout.

scenarioExplorer.noScenarioSelected: Click here to select a scenario using an infrastructure and a dedicated timetable.

simulation.additionalResults: No results were found for your request; alternative options are being computed.
simulation.infoMessage: This simulation doesn't ensure the availability of the path.

results.changeSearchCriteria: You can modify your search criteria to find a solution.
results.gesicoRequest: and attach this document to your GESICO request.
results.notFound: No path was found for this configuration
results.pathNotFound: Clash with existing train and/or work schedules.
results.simulationDownstream: Simulation automatically computed as no capacity was found for the requested criteria: the tolerance <underline>before</underline> departure time was increased.
results.simulationUpstream: Simulation automatically computed as no capacity was found for the requested criteria: the tolerance <underline>after</underline> departure time was increased.
results.simulationsWithConflicts: Two other simulations were automatically computed based on this configuration.
results.startNewQueryFromCurrent: Start a new query from the current one

status.errorMessage: We are sorry that we could not process your request. The LMR team has been notified and will be aware of the situation as soon as possible.

upgrade.reason: This simulation does not meet your needs because…

stdcmErrors.incompatibleConstraints_one: The requested path contains the following error:
stdcmErrors.incompatibleConstraints_other: The requested path contains the following errors:
stdcmErrors.incompatibleConstraints_zero: Constraint error on the requested path

invalidFields.maxSpeed: the maximum speed of the consist
invalidFields.totalLength: the total length of the consist
invalidFields.totalMass: the total mass of the consist

missingFields.maxSpeed: the maximum speed of the consist
missingFields.timeDestination: the arrival time at the destination
missingFields.timeOrigin: the departure time at the origin
missingFields.totalLength: the total length of the consist
missingFields.totalMass: the total mass of the consist

stdcmErrors.pathfindingFailed: No path have been found for these waypoints.
stdcmErrors.requestFailed: Calculation error for last minute train path

routeErrors.bothPointAreScheduled: The calculation cannot take into account both an origin and a destination schedule. You have to choose one or the other:
routeErrors.global: Please check the errors related to the following route:
routeErrors.noScheduledPoint: The calculation requires either the origin or destination schedule.
routeErrors.viaStopDurationMissing: Please specify the stop duration for the intermediate OP.
routeErrors.viaStopDurationTooShort: The driver switch stop time is usually at least 3 minutes.
routeErrors.zeroLengthPath: Origin and destination cannot be the same.
